<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="3919" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition, lemma" language="en">
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN" lemma="at">At</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="PRP$" lemma="my">my</word>
			<word type="NN" lemma="door">door</word>
			<word type="DT" lemma="the">the</word>
			<word type="NNS" lemma="leaf">leaves</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBP" lemma="be">are</word>
		<word type="VBG" lemma="fall">falling</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=":" lemma=";">;</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT" lemma="a">A</word>
		<word type="JJ" lemma="cold">cold</word>
		<word type="JJ" lemma="wild">wild</word>
		<word type="NN" lemma="wind">wind</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ" lemma="have">has</word>
		<word type="VBN" lemma="come">come</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="." lemma=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
<sentence id="3920" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition, lemma" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NNS" lemma="sweetheart">Sweethearts</word>
		<word type="NN" lemma="walk">walk</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PP">
		<word type="IN" lemma="by">by</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="ADVP">
		<word type="RB" lemma="together">together</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=":" lemma=";">;</word>
	</chink>
	<chink>
		<word type="CC" lemma="and">And</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="PRP" lemma="i">I</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="RB" lemma="still">still</word>
		<word type="JJ" lemma="miss">miss</word>
		<word type="NN" lemma="someone">someone</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="." lemma=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","3"
